name: CTERA Solution for Azure Sentinel
description: This solution integrates CTERA logs into Azure Sentinel to detect and respond to potential security threats, including ransomware attacks and mass file deletions.

analyticsRules.name: Ransom Protect User Blocked
analyticsRules.description: Detects malicious users blocked by CTERA Ransom Protect AI engine.

analyticsRules.name: Ransom Protect Detected a Ransomware Attack
analyticsRules.description: Monitors CTERA platform to detect potential ransomware attacks detected by CTERA Ransom Protect AI engine. Once detected, the following information will be exposed: Virtual portal, Edge Filer, IP, User, Incident Type, Start and end time.

huntingQueries.name: CTERA Mass Permission Change Detection
huntingQueries.description: This query detects permission changes generated by the CTERA Edge Filer.

huntingQueries.name: CTERA Mass File Deletions Detection
huntingQueries.description: This query detects file deletions generated by the CTERA Edge Filer.

workbooks.name: CTERA Workbook
workbooks.description: A workbook to visualize and monitor CTERA log data.
